reviewText: Bought for a nights inside during storms or bad weather.Really haven't dated as much as I thought, they make a good double feature, but only if you like 1980's and 1990's flavor of simple comedy.If you did, you'll enjoy these. If you don't, I wouldn't, but then again, for the price?
Title: N/A

reviewText: Although the back of the case claims both films have been remastered in high definition, I doubt it.  In fact they seem to be the exact same single disc versions that were previously available.  "My Stepmother is an Alien" is still full frame here, which is suspect for a film that would have been remastered in 2009-2010.  Aside from that the picture quality is pristine.  "Blind Date" is presented in its original 2:35 aspect ratio, and though perfectly watchable by 480p standards, it's clearly at least a ten year-old transfer (again, same disc as before).  Considering you get two unique movies I'd say it's worth a buy if you're a fan of either one.  Still, shame on Sony for the false advertising, or their incompetent graphic design department.
Title: N/A

reviewText: First of all I really do not like John Larroquette.  Normally I find his work tedious and silly.  However, he gives a brilliant performance in this movie that is over-the-top and yet still believable.  I think this is by far his best performance ever.  Add to that very good performances by Bruce Willis and the very sexy Kim Basinger and others and you have an extremely good movie and perhaps the funniest I have ever seen.I like to watch this movie at least once a year and I never fail to enjoy it immensely.  If you want a good laugh buy and watch this movie.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Before ordering these movies I have never seen them before. I watched them for the first time last night and I really enjoyed Blind Date. I wasn't sure about My Stepmother. I thought it was going to be corny. But it wasn't bad. I enjoyed that movie too. These are great movies. If you have never seen them you should.

reviewText: For the low price DELIVERED of under $3, I got two complete movies each on their own discs, conveniently in one easy package.  Easy as in it was labeled perfect on the spine of the case to know there were 2 featured films within the case.  I bought used and it was as if it were NEW, but BETTER - no packaging to fuss with!  ;)Thanks Amazon Prime for the FREE 2 Day Shipping, $79 for Prime membership annually is becoming a definate renew in my mind more, and more as the months move on and Ive got half a year left to go before this term is expired!
